system.prerequisites: Mark of Tzeentch WP 50+, Psy Rating 5
system.sustained: Psyker fires a Psychic Bolt which may be dodged as if a ranged attack. If it hits it deals Psy Rating d10 Damage with Penetration 9, with Felling(Psy Rating) Quality. If the target is a living creature, they must immediately make a +0 Toughness Test. Failiure results in the target gaining 1d5 Corruption Points per Degree of Failure. 5+ Degrees of Failiure and target instantly dies, rapidly mutating into a Chaos Spawn which collapses in screeching agony and ichor.
